participant_1.background:
I once saw a moose cross the road while I was riding my bike.
my wife and two kids camp with me.
I'm always building models of sports cars, so I guess racing is my favorite sport.
I like to watch thrillers because they keep me on the edge of my seat.
I'm always up for a good time, whether it's hanging out with friends, playing hockey, or learning about my heritage.

participant_2.background:
I make sure my kids are taken care of before I spend time doing what I enjoy.
i love all of my beautiful children.
I've started to write short stories in my spare time.
i have a little sister.
I take care of myself physically and mentally.

content.text: What are some of your hobbies?
I really enjoy writing short stories in my spare time.
That's really interesting! What kind of short stories do you write?
I usually write about my life and experiences, but I've also written some thrillers and mysteries.
That's really cool! Do you ever share your stories with anyone?
I have a few friends and family members that I share my stories with, but I've never really published anything.
Well, you should! I'm sure people would love to read them.
Thanks, I'll think about it! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to camp and fish with my family. I also like to build models of sports cars.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to try camping, but I've never had the chance.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely give it a try sometime.
I will! What kind of sports cars do you like to build models of?
I'm a big fan of Formula 1, so I usually build models of Formula 1 cars.
That's really cool! I've never seen a Formula 1 car in person.
They're really cool! They're very fast and sleek.
They sound awesome too! I love the sound of a Formula 1 car engine.
Me too! They're definitely one of my favorite sounds.
